attributes.action: NOT ALLOW OUR CHILREN TO BE EXPOSED TO SEXUAL CONTENT BELOW THE AGE OF 12
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dear Sir

It is with great concern and a very heavt heart that I am writting this to you.
An artical in the paper yesterday as spoken of teaching our children in school the pleaseure of homosexual sex. As a parent I am shocked that a think tank would even want to expose young children to sex at an age below 12 especailly where pedofillia is so rife.

Please protect our children from immoral views and sexual content while they are young.
I understand that homosexual people have rights and I respect their right but is their right to show young children as young as 5 how to have sex,
Regards

Dwight
